title: Knowledge Base
subtitle: Manage and query knowledge base content

notInstalled.title: Knowledge base plugin is not installed yet

empty.title: No knowledge base yet, create one now! ðŸ™‚

list.title: Knowledge Base List
list.tips: Tips: Learn how to use through /kb command in chat page!

createDialog.title: Create New Knowledge Base
createDialog.descriptionPlaceholder: Brief description of the knowledge base...
createDialog.tips: Tips: Once you choose an embedding model for a knowledge base, please do not modify the provider's model or vector dimension information, otherwise it will seriously affect the recall rate of the knowledge base or even cause errors.

contentDialog.title: Knowledge Base Management
contentDialog.usage: Usage: Enter "/kb use {name}" in the chat page

upload.title: Upload Files to Knowledge Base
upload.subtitle: Supports txt, pdf, word, excel and other formats
upload.dropzone: Drag and drop files here or click to upload

chunkSettings.title: Chunk Settings
chunkSettings.tooltip:
Chunk size determines the size of each text block, overlap length determines the overlap between adjacent text blocks.
Smaller chunks are more precise but increase quantity, appropriate overlap can improve retrieval accuracy.
chunkSettings.chunkSizeHint: Control the size of each text block, leave empty to use default value
chunkSettings.overlapHint: Control the overlap between adjacent text blocks, leave empty to use default value

search.queryPlaceholder: Enter keywords to search knowledge base content...

deleteDialog.title: Confirm Delete
deleteDialog.confirmText: Are you sure you want to delete knowledge base {name}?
deleteDialog.warning: This operation is irreversible, all knowledge base content will be permanently deleted.

messages.getKnowledgeBaseListFailed: Failed to get knowledge base list
messages.getEmbeddingModelListFailed: Failed to get embedding model list

importFromUrl.title: Import from URL
importFromUrl.urlPlaceholder: Enter the URL of the web page to extract knowledge from
importFromUrl.tooltip:
These options control how text is extracted and processed from the URL content.
Leave blank to use the plugin's default settings.
Enabling LLM text repair and summary may take a long time.
importFromUrl.preRequisite: Hint: Please go to the plugin market to install astrbot_plugin_url_2_knowledge_base and follow the instructions in the plugin documentation to complete the playwright installation before using this feature.
